venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Someone suggested The Fighter, starring Mark Wahlberg and Christian Bale, for a meetup. It opens next week, but I've been hearing good things about this film. How does Monday, December 20 work for everyone?

A look at the early years of boxer "Irish" Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s.

According to moviefone.com, the showtime is 7:05 on Monday. Let's meet in the lobby at Blackstone Valley Cinema at about 6:35. Anyone who wants to can join me for food and socializing after the movie.

- David
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my photo, but with a goatee now.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Fighter
